You don't need a GitLab account to use Git locally, but for the purpose of this guide we recommend registering and signing into your account before starting. Some commands need a connection between the files in your computer and their version on a remote serveru.
Nettsted: http://www.domain.com
Nettsted: http://www.domain.com er ogs√• et nettsted
Vel bruker@domain.com don't need a GitLab account to use Git locally, but for the purpose of this guide we recommend registering and signing into your account before starting. Some commands need a connection between the files in your computer and their version on a remote server.
